reviewText:
As a kickstarter backer, I had the chance to play it in its original version. The game is a well balanced strategy board game with nice mechanics that work very well and jelly aliens with a good AI.
Ufho2 delivers a surprisingly great amount of contents: from the story mode to the different characters and the gameplay modifiers.
I strongly advise to play it against other (human or alien) players because it's how the game is meant to be played.

DISCLOUSURE: I personally know one of the developers.

reviewText: Cute, fun, addictive game. From the story to the puzzles, this game is very, very well made. I am not very good at strategy games, but I really enjoy playing this.\nhttps://youtu.be/YH7jWuBNaFo
